From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 Indian romantic comedy film


Jogira Sara Ra RaTheatrical release posterDirected byKushan NandyWritten byGhalib Asad BhopaliProduced byKiran ShroffNaeem SiddiquiStarringNawazuddin SiddiquiNeha SharmaZarina Wahab Manisha gupta CinematographySourabh WaghmareEdited byVirendra GharseMusic byScore:Anup BhatSongs:Tanishk BagchiMeet BrosHitesh ModakProductioncompanyTouchwood Multimedia CreationsDistributed byAA FilmsRelease date
26 May 2023 (2023-05-26)
Running time121 minutes[1]CountryIndiaLanguageHindiBudgetest. ₹25 croreBox officeest. ₹1.75 crore
Jogira Sara Ra Ra is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language romantic comedy film written by Ghalib Asad Bhopali and directed by Kushan Nandy and jointly produced by Kiran Shroff and Naeem Siddiqui. The film stars Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Neha Sharma,[2] alongside Sanjay Mishra and Mahaakshay Chakraborty in supporting roles.[3] It was released theatrically on 26 May 2023.[4]


Cast[edit]
Nawazuddin Siddiqui as Jogi Pratap
Neha Sharma as Dimple Chaubey
Sanjay Mishra as Chacha Chaudhry
Mahaakshay Chakraborty as Lallu
Zarina Wahab
Suman Patel as Sarita
Ananya Thakur as Lalita
Aanshi pal as Babita
Manisha Gupta as Kavita
Nikki Tamboli as Item number in the song "Cocktail"
Production[edit]
The principal photography began on 27 February 2021.[5] The film was wrapped up on 7 April 2021.[6]

Music[edit]
Jogira Sara Ra RaSoundtrack album by Meet Bros, Tanishk Bagchi and Hitesh ModakReleased14 April 2023[7]Recorded2021-2022GenreFeature film soundtrackLength9:14LanguageHindiLabelZee Music CompanyOfficial audioJogira Sara Ra Ra (Audio Jukebox) on YouTube

The songs are composed by Meet Bros, Tanishk Bagchi and Hitesh Modak while the song  lyrics are written by Lavraj, Kumaar and Vayu.[7]

No.TitleLyricsMusicSinger(s)Length1."Babua"LavrajHitesh ModakSuvarna Tiwari, Anandi Joshi3:102."Torture"KumaarMeet BrosJonita Gandhi, Meet Bros3:373."Cocktail"VayuTanishk BagchiNakash Aziz, Nikhita Gandhi2:27Total length:9:14
Reception[edit]
Box office[edit]
As of 30 May, Jogira Sara Ra Ra collected 1.93 crore.[6]

^ "Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Neha Sharma to star in rom-com 'Jogira Sara Ra Ra'". The New Indian Express. 10 August 2020. Retrieved 4 March 2021.

^ "Nawazuddin, Neha Sharma to shoot for Jogira Sara Ra Ra! from February 25". New Indian Express. 22 February 2021. Retrieved 4 March 2021.

^ "Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Neha Sharma starrer Jogira Sara Ra Ra to now release on May 26". Bollywood Hungama. 9 May 2023. Retrieved 10 May 2023.

^ "Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Neha Sharma start filming 'Jogira Sara Ra Ra'". India TV. 27 February 2021. Retrieved 4 March 2021.

^ a b "Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Neha Sharma wrap up Kushan Nandy's Jogira Sara Ra Ra shoot". Bollywood Hungama. 7 April 2021. Retrieved 7 April 2021.
